title: Vase, 1956
description: Ovoid form on slight foot, with large flaring neck. Dark red body, glazed dark brown inside.  On outside, one horse with raised outlines and painted red, and another, incised against a red background.  Between them, a blue tree and a sunburst like figure, both incised.  Above and below, rows of incised parallel lines and dots, red, blue and yellow.
